events.title: Jim Wickwire and Louis Reichardt reach the summit of K2

movie.title: K2
movie.plot: Taylor and Harold are good friends and avid climbers. While climbing one day, they meet a man who it seems might be attempting to climb K2, the world's second-highest peak. Always pushy, Taylor bugs the man for a spot on the team, claiming that he and Harold are good enough. They may be very good, but K2 is a very tough mountain.

events.title: a unit of British soldiers find themselves trapped in a minefield

movie.title: Kilo Two Bravo
movie.plot: In September 2006, a 3 man patrol of Paras sets off from their outpost overlooking Kajaki Dam in southern Afghanistan, to engage the Taliban. As they make their way across a dried out river bed one of them steps on a mine left from the Russian occupation some 25 years before. His colleagues rush to his aid only to find they are surrounded by mines and every move threatens serious injury or death.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 4 wins & 6 nominations.
